title: Trelleborg
content:
Trelleborg offers the widest rubber sheeting range available in the market, and at the same time, they are specialists in developing new products.

NR/SBR rubber sheeting

Natural rubber/SBR sheeting has excellent mechanical properties making it particularly appreciated in environments subject to heavy wear due to friction, or where it is constantly exposed to impact or direct contact with abrasive elements.

EPDM

Excellent ageing properties (heat, ozone, weathering). Good resistance to acids, bases, solvents and steam. Remains flexible at low temperature. Not resistant to hydrocarbons and fat products.

NBR

Excellent resistance to oils, fats, petroleum based products and organic solvents. Low resistance to weathering, ozone and UV.

CR-CHLOROPRENE

Good mechanical and physical properties, low compression set values and good bending. Very good resistance to weathering, ozone and UV. Good resistance to diluted acids, alifatic solvents, oils and petroleum based products.

VITON FKM

Excellent chemical resistance. Excellent resistance to very high temperatures. Good mechanical and physical properties.

SILICONE

Silicone sheeting is physiologically inert and maintains its stability in extreme environments in a wide temperature range.

IIR-BUTYL

Very good resistance to acids, bases, and steam. Good resistance to animal or vegetable fats and oils.
Weathering, ozone and UV resistant.

CSM

Good chemical resistance against acids and bases.
